text: George Hege Hamilton IV (July 19, 1937 â€“ September 17, 2014) was an American country musician. He began performing in the late 1950s as a teen idol, later switching to country music in the early 1960s. He performed for the Grand Ole Opry for nearly 50 years. Hamilton had a heart attack on September 13, 2014. He later died at Saint Thomas Midtown Hospital in Nashville on September 17. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Country musicians from North Carolina Category:Singers from North Carolina Category:People from Winston-Salem, North Carolina
title: George Hamilton IV
